scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && VITE_USE_MOCK=false npm run dev
scripts.dev:ingest: cd backend/ingest-service && source venv/bin/activate && python main.py
scripts.dev:gateway: cd backend/api-gateway && source venv/bin/activate && python main.py
scripts.dev:detection: cd backend/detection-engine && source venv/bin/activate && python main.py
scripts.dev:alert: cd backend/alert-manager && source venv/bin/activate && python main.py
scripts.dev:response: cd backend/response-engine && source venv/bin/activate && python main.py
scripts.dev:backend: npx concurrently -k -c "blue,magenta,cyan,yellow,red" -n "INGEST,GATEWAY,DETECT,ALERT,RESP" "npm run dev:ingest" "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:detection" "npm run dev:alert" "npm run dev:response"
scripts.dev: npx concurrently -k -c "green,blue" -n "FRONT,BACK" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
